title: found my new support main (non-meta)
body: gnar. gr8 poke. gr8 cc. can maintain rage very well seen as he doesnt ALWAYS need 2 last hit. ive had gr8 success with him in ranked so far. very tanky in mega. not much can touch him. zekes herald works well with him (not many supports do). honestly hes just very solid IMO. anyone else found a new non-meta champ?

replies.body:
{{champion:101}} 

gg ADC has no HP bar any more, poke poke poke
{{champion:78}} and {{champion:127}} are some of the better ones.

{{champion:133}}


Oh wait, you want new non-meta champs...

Had a J4 sup before. Worked well.

Oh and a Xin.. We destroyed.
